document.full_text: mississippi legislators last year put one of the nation's toughest anti-methamphetamine laws into effect -- and officials say the results so far are dramatic.
document.title: mississippi says prescription-only law works in meth fight
lines_and_colors: mississippi legislators last year put one of the nation's toughest anti-methamphetamine laws into effect -- and officials say the results so far are dramatic.
